headline: Here's Why Datadog (DDOG) Fell More Than Broader Market
summary: Datadog (DDOG) reached $136.5 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a -1.9% change compared to its last close.

headline: Datadog (DDOG) Expands Board With Appointment Of Former WhatsApp Product Leader
summary: On September 11, 2025, Datadog (DDOG) announced the addition of Ami Vora to its Board of Directors, effectively expanding its board leadership. This move comes amidst a quarter where the company's stock price rose by 15.53%. The increase aligns with broader market trends, as the Nasdaq hit a new record high driven by strong performance in tech stocks, although Datadog's stock price moved more sharply. Vora's appointment, considered an enhancement with her leadership experience, complements...
